page.title: 04ROMSLEY VILLAGE
page.content:
Romsley village is a peaceful place and is also quite small. There aren't many things to interest people living in the area, except for the mobile library, cubs and scouts.There are a few corner shops nearby, but people have to travel to Dudley or Halesowen for the main{shops.}The only{jobs}in the area are to do with farming, so many people who live here have to travel to work by car or bus.
The{houses}have fairly large drives and are a long way from the road. It is a very tidy place with no litter or grafitti. Recently new houses have been built.People who live in Romsley are different from where we live (Frankley). They are quiet and like to keep themselves to themselves.
